name: Hand Gun
description:
"Four brave younger adventures, journey through their own imaginations in hopes of finding the legendary snacks. Little did the children know that what awaited them were deadly traps, treacherous terrain and vicious bullies ready to rob them of their lunch money. The children must arm themselves to protect each other on this wild adventure with, well, their hands. Play as four playable children, each with their own traits and battle it out with the bullies and solve the puzzles to obtain the legendary snacks that mum said no to. Journey through four stages, born from the minds and interests of the children and re-live your own childhood in a adventurous and almost real game, of hand gun!"
